title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 125: Featuring Brent Sopel + Teddy Purcell
description:
On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Teddy Purcell and Brent Sopel. Teddy stops by to discuss what it was like to be at Martin St. Louis's Hall of Fame ceremony along with a few other stories. And Sopel joins to discuss his entire career, his dyslexia, what he's up to now and a ton more. The guys also touch on some news around the NHL as well as a quick NBA rant from Whit.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
